text: Indeed, We gave Musa the Book, and after him We sent messengers, one following the other; and We gave clear signs to â€˜Isa, the son of Maryam (Jesus, the son of Mary), and supported him with the Holy Spirit. Then, how is it that every time a prophet came to you with what does not meet your desires, you grew arrogant? So, you gave the lie to a group (of the messengers) and killed others
